root.name: Young Merlin
root.description: OverviewYoung Merlin is a SNES adventure game in the same vain as Legend of Zelda. The most notable features are insanely hard mine cart sequences and a dragon boss that you had to shoot in the butt with lighting, I don't mean just shoot him from behind you have to shoot him in the butt.

similar_games.game: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past & Four Swords
